name: Speedy Jumper (unne27)
description:
Speedy Jumper is a simple fast-paced platformer where the world falls apart under your feet!

Use the downloadable version if the web version doesn't work, lags too much, or looks too bad.

You can slide on walls and jump off them

Also the name sucks.

The game is a bit unbalanced, might balance and add more levels in the future.

The game lacks music because I'm no musician

Known bugs and issues:

At the start of level one, everything is stretched.
